Name: Heavenly Hammer
About the game: Take part in a fun battle, destroy enemies with the mouse to score points, pump up and unlock stunningly beautiful drawings of women's bodies that diversify the graphics and help you relax ;) Or will you want to turn them off and focus on the gameplay? As you wish! Immerse Yourself In Heavenly Hammer Funny physics Convenient mouse control Hand-drawn graphics Twenty amazing drawings!
